com.github.nwillc.reloader

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nwillc.reloader.FileUtils

  • public final class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilites for working with files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String findNewest(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Given a filename, of the versioned form "path-version.type" look at all the files matching "path.*\.type" and find the one with the newest modified date.
      static java.util.stream.Stream<java.nio.file.Path> ls(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String pattern)
      List files in a directory that match a pattern.
      static java.lang.String toPattern(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Takes a path and attempts to return a regex pattern that handles any "version" of the file, for example "foo/bar/file-1.0.txt" would yield "file.+\.txt" which would match other versions such as "file-2.3.txt".

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • toPattern

        public static java.lang.String toPattern(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Takes a path and attempts to return a regex pattern that handles any "version" of the file, for example "foo/bar/file-1.0.txt" would yield "file.+\.txt" which would match other versions such as "file-2.3.txt".
        Parameters:
        path - file path
        Returns:
        the resulting pattern

      • ls

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.nio.file.Path> ls(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                                             java.lang.String pattern)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        List files in a directory that match a pattern.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the directory
        pattern - The regex pattern to match.
        Returns:
        The files that match.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • findNewest

        public static java.lang.String findNewest(java.nio.file.Path path)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Given a filename, of the versioned form "path-version.type" look at all the files matching "path.*\.type" and find the one with the newest modified date.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of file
        Returns:
        the newest version
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
